Reviews.Title: CRAZY
Reviews.Author: Crystal
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this hear... U can go to the virgin mobile site and get it brand new for 199... Sad to see how people can just rip off people making it look like a great deal...

Reviews.Title: Best Place to buy this Phone
Reviews.Author: Evergreen17
Reviews.Content: This phone is really a steal for 300 dollars on a no contract plan. It can do almost everything that the new iphone 5s can do, because it runs the same operating system iOS 7.

Reviews.Title: iphone 4 review
Reviews.Author: CHERI LAND
Reviews.Content: LOVE THIS PHONE AND THE WHOLE ORDERING PROCESS IT WAS EASY AND THE PHONE IS EXACTLY WHAT I WANTED WILL DO THIS AGAIN WITH AMAZON WHEN I AM READY FOR NEW PHONE THANK YOU

Reviews.Title: nice price
Reviews.Author: ignacio
Reviews.Content: no flaws updated to ios  whn it came in the ail ad came with a diffrent charger brand but itd better so....

Reviews.Title: iphone 4 Virgin Mobile
Reviews.Author: Tammi Messer
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this product.  service was quick and easy. bought this for roommates daughter and she was very surprised and happy

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: Lauren laehle
Reviews.Content: exactly what I ordered and I'm happy with it. Its a very good phone even if they are coming out with new and better this is still a great one.

Reviews.Title: These are cheaper directly from Virgin Mobile!
Reviews.Author: Nissa
Reviews.Content: Go to Virgin Mobile online.  You can buy a new one with no wear on it for $50 less! No lie.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: starr barron
Reviews.Content: I have to say this is my first IPhone and I love it! It took a min for me to get it activated but after that it was  good. It was in perfect condition no scratches or anything it was like it was brand new! And the price was reasonable and the seller was nice he kept you updated and always responded and helped me when I have issues and it arrived when  it was suppose to so that was plus it also came with screen protectors front and back and a portable charger thing! Which was extra and I will be using including all the original ass. Overall I love this product and the good feedback from the seller.!

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC
Reviews.Author: A. Champion "frugal gal"
Reviews.Content: The other review that the iphone 4 is available without a contract on Virgin Mobile's website is not true.As of 8/5/2013, this phone when purchased new on VM's page is 297.49It's a standard iphone with all the bells and whistles you would expect from Apple, but through Virgin Mobile, you can get a prepaid no contract plan for under $80, no other carrier offers this low of a price.I have this phone and I use VM for my plan and love it, no problems at all.Why someone would rate THE PRODUCT 1 star, and recommend Virgin Mobile to be cheaper is nonsense.
